Fungible Token

Fungible tokens can be exchanged among individuals for trading, sale and purchase of goods and services.

FA 1.2

FA 1.2 specification for Tezos Fungible Token.

ERC20

Transcription to Tezos World of Ethereum ERC20 norm.

NFT

A Non-Fungible Token is a unit of data on a digital ledger called a blockchain, where each NFT can represent a unique digital item. NFTs can represent digital files such as art, audio, videos, items in video games and other forms of creative work.

FA 2

FA 2 specification for Tezos Non Fungible Token

DeFi

DeFi is short for “decentralized finance”, an umbrella term for a variety of financial applications.

Zero-Coupon Bond

A transcription to Tezos of a Zero-Coupon bond.

DEX

A Uniswap-like decentralized exchange.

ICO

An example of ICO process.

Autocallable note

A transcription to the Tezos blockchain of an auto-callable note from Goldman Sachs.

Payment

Implement decentralised payment process for retail, marketing, insurance, ... with the blockchain.

Escrow

Escrow the purchase amount and transfer it to seller under conditions.

Miles

Collect and consume miles.

Connected Object

Switch on a connected object for a certain duration against payment.

Health Care

Payments between patient, insurer, and doctors.

Governance

Blockchain traceability and immutability makes it especially suitable for process whose goal is to establish a consensus.

Idea Box

Collect and determine best ideas to improve a process.

Competition

Collect submissions and declare the best one.

Auction

Auction process to transfer ownership of FA2 NFTs.

A 2

Whitelisting process to define transfer permissions per group of users.

info

If you need a specific version of a contract, or a contract not listed here, please contact us.

Install#

Install contract templates with the following command:

git clone https://github.com/edukera/completium-contract-templates.git
